ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dragon Slaying
ygData.msgSnippet: Pretty hard to steal the moat pulls. It takes an act of God just to pull from the moat since the last patches. They don t like to pop out and most groups don t
ygData.messageBody:
Pretty hard to steal the moat pulls. It takes an act of God just to pull from the moat since the last patches. They don't like to pop out and most groups don't like diving in. If you have left Moat or Right Moat camped they swim by and nothing is even close to you except the opposite moat and there's enough distance that pulls from the water and sides are completely uncontested. Only pulls that get stolen for Moats are center aisle and midzone pulls.
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3
To: 'warriors_eq@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2001 2:11 PM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Dragon Slaying

The fact that you can see them carrying it only adds to the jerks who WILL try and steal it.  At least on my server.
 
Mu
-----Origin[Nygaardr, FC3]  al Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2001 2:02 PM
To: warriors_eq@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dragon Slaying

Pick up a Jarsanth Trident from Karnor's. I forget which mob has them but you can SEE them carrying it so that  should help. We pulled ours at left moat, from the water.
----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Swift
To: warriors_eq@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2001 11:56 AM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dragon Slaying


I am starting to look for a guild (currently guildless) on Bertox so I can
start getting in on raids. I am currently looking at Forsaken Conclave
because I know a few people there from my days with The Black Company.

I am really looking to killing some dragons.

Bael, Level 42 Warrior of Innoruuk

Equipment:

Carnal Pauldrons
Crafted arms
crafted bracer
hero bracer

grotesque mask
ry'gorr helm
orc fang earrings
jagged bands
crafted legs
crafted boots
crafted guantlets

Weapons

Enamelled black mace
Ranged:
Runed Bone Fork

Need to get a better blunt weapon.
Going to start piercing cause I want to get a lance as well.
